raw_body: WIJEYARATNE – DENZIL KINGSLEY. Beloved husband of the late Chinthamani Neeliya, loving father of Mandika and Chandrika, Varuna and Siruni, Sharmalee and Harsha, loving grandfather of Lihini and Sanuja, Manuk and Indira, Vishan and Shavin, Anushke and Sonia, Nathasha and Nipuna, great grandfather of Karina and Mars.
